groups.name: box.libs.scheduler
groups.description: Tapsi Scheduler configuration properties for job scheduling and Quartz integration.

properties.name: box.libs.scheduler.quartz.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Quartz scheduler integration. When disabled, scheduler interface will not schedule on the quartz infrastructure.

properties.name: box.libs.scheduler.cron-job.scheduling-enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable automatic scheduling of cron jobs. When enabled, all CronScheduler beans will be automatically scheduled at startup.

properties.name: box.libs.scheduler.cron-job.scheduling-excludes
properties.description: List of bean names of CronScheduler beans to exclude from automatic scheduling. Useful for selectively disabling certain cron jobs.
